entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
